name: MIDI Instrument Definition File
summary: Learn about .IDF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IDF files are usually referenced by audio production programs and typically should not be opened manually.

description: Defines the parameters for a specific MIDI instrument, such as a MIDI keyboard or other MIDI controller; provides an instrument ID, patch names (voices), a key map, channel assignments, and other information.
